welcomeMessage1: Create your workout plan, save your results and track your progress.
welcomeMessage2: Join our community and train methodically.
thanks: Thank you for visiting the site!
questions: Demo site? Explain yourself better, what kind of site is this?
I'd like to know more. Can I find the code somewhere?
answers: Hi, my name is Alessio Logozzo, and I am a developer! Welcome to this demo site

Well, demo in the sense that it's merely demonstrative but fully functional. You can really register and save your training sessions, see graphs of your progress, jot down information in your personal diary...
You can register a new account using the button on the top bar
Alternatively, you can log in using an account specifically designated for this! The credentials are 'user', 'user'
On the front-end, the site is developed in Angular 17, on the back-end with Spring Boot (Java). Security is managed through Keycloak.
Certainly! On the right, you will find links to my GitHub and other useful resources
For any information, feel free to contact me!
alternativeAnswer: Certainly! I'll send you my contact information.
httpErrorMessages: Seems like there has been an issue
If the problem persists, please contact me!
temp2: This project is not yet finished. For now, you can use the BMI calculator and save the result.
temp3: The next version will add tabs into which you can group your exercises, the possibility to save your training sessions and statistics.
